display_name: Average hours per week spent engaged in vigorous recreational activities or sports such as jogging, swimming, cycling, aerobic dance, skiing, or other similar activities, in the 12 months before this pregnancy - Mother
description: During the 12 months before this pregnancy, on average, how many hours per week did you spend engaged in vigorous recreational activities or sports such as jogging, swimming, cycling, aerobic dance, skiing, or other similar activities?
